contract_type.explanation: The document refers to amendments to an ISDA Master Agreement and its Schedule, as well as a Credit Support Annex. The main contract being amended is the ISDA Master Agreement.

contract_type_version.explanation: No specific version year (e.g., 1992 or 2002) of the ISDA Master Agreement is mentioned in the text.

contract_date.explanation: The original ISDA Master Agreement and Credit Support Annex are both stated as dated November 15, 2012.

amendment_date.explanation: The amending agreement is explicitly dated as of November 12, 2013.

amendment_number.explanation: No explicit amendment number is mentioned in the text.

version_type.explanation: The document is titled 'AMENDING AGREEMENT' and describes amendments to the Schedule of the ISDA Master Agreement.

status.explanation: The document is not marked as draft and is dated and formatted as a final agreement, indicating execution.

party_name_1.explanation: Listed as the first party in the agreement heading.

party_role_1.explanation: While not explicitly labeled, context and ISDA conventions indicate THE BANK OF NOVA SCOTIA is Party A.

party_name_2.explanation: Listed as the second party in the agreement heading.

party_role_2.explanation: While not explicitly labeled, context and ISDA conventions indicate HALIFAX FUNDING LLC is Party B.

document_quality.explanation: The text is clean, well-formatted, and free of typos or OCR errors.
